channel.title: NLP with Fewer Labels
channel.description: Theories and Methods of Natural Language Processing with Fewer Labels.

item.title: The National Natural Science Funds Project Approval Notice
item.description:
According to the "Regulation on the National Natural Science Funds", relevant project management regulations, and expert review opinions, the National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC) has decided to fund the project you applied for.

Grant: 62236004, project name: Theories and Methods of Natural Language Processing with Fewer Labels, direct cost: 2.83 million yuan, project period: 2023.1.1 -- 2027.12.31.
